title: Footsteps
description: 90 seamless loops of steps on different surfaces, + 180 samples sounds of footsteps on different surfaces.
longDescription:
FootstepUpdate Preview https://soundcloud.com/valery-oleynikov/sets/footstepupdate


Updated the sound of footsteps on different surfaces, the package includes such sounds as

steps on concrete, steps on the grass, steps on gravel, steps in the snow, steps on the water

and steps on wood.

The package includes as well 180 single sounds.


Update:


concrete (Improved sound)

grass (The sounds become more realistic)

gravel(Improved sound)

snow (Improved sound)

water (The sounds become more realistic)

wood (Improved sound)

Sample pack includes -


90 seamless loops

Steps on concrete (5-running loops, 5-slow steps loops, 5-walking loops)

Steps on the grass (5-running loops, 5-slow steps loops, 5-walking loops)

Steps on gravel (5-running loops, 5-slow steps loops, 5-walking loops)

Steps in the snow (5-running loops, 5-slow steps loops, 5-walking loops)

Steps on the water (5-running loops, 5-slow steps loops, 5-walking loops)

Steps on wood (5-running loops, 5-slow steps loops, 5-walking loops)

The time of each loops 0.06 sec


180 samples sounds

concrete - 30 semples

grass - 30 semples

gravel - 30 semples

snow - 30 semples

water - 30 semples

wood - 30 semples

The time of each sample 0.01 sec
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio tracks: 270

Number of Audio Cues: 270

Sample rate \ bit rate:44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Seamless audio loop - Yes

How many minutes of audio provided: 12 minutes

Intended Platform: all

Tested Platforms: Windows

Documentation Included: No

Support: mgwsound@icloud.com﻿

Size 129MB
